lead_paragraph: McALLISTER--Susan. Susan Davidson Marr McAllister of Palm Beach FL and Quogue, NY, died today, Friday, March 4, 2016, under loving Hospice care. Susan was predeceased by her brother James Davidson. She is survived by her sister Ellen Baer, her husband Bruce, her daughter Elizabeth Marr Hallas (husband Jeffrey) of Lantana FL; by her sons David F. Marr III (fiance Sabrina Muheim) of Palm Beach and Anthony J. Marr (wife Amy), of Sag Harbor, NY, three grandsons Jeffrey and Matthew Hallas and Alexander Nanci-Marr, nephew Henry Baer, Jr. and niece Susan Baer (Chan). Susan was born in Manhattan on April 20, 1937, to James A. Davidson and Ann Nicholson Davidson. Susan's children attended Collegiate and Nightingale Bamford schools and, while they were there, Susan joined friends to found Summerhouse Restaurant on Madison Ave. She summered in Quogue NY where she owned and operated the Inn at Quogue and The Patio Restaurant in Westhampton NY. A visitation will be held Monday, March 7, at 5:30 at Quattelbaum Funeral home, 6411 Parker Avenue, West Palm Beach, FL 33405. A funeral mass will be held Tuesday, March 8, at 1pm at St. Edwards Church, 144 N. County Road, Palm Beach, FL 33480. Susan was our true North with an unbending will and a generous, vibrant and loving heart. Whatever makes life worth living, she had it in full measure and showered it unstintingly on all who knew her. 1/3
